column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It is no surprise that every time you step into this place you're instantly greeted by a line and the smell of perfection. The line does not serve as a source of frustration but rather joins you with a community of enthusiasts that is anticipating some of the greatest pastries in town. Amongst these is the KOUIGN-AMANN - a caramelized Breton cake that fulfills your dreams in every way.
